name: Nightfall's Embrace
description: A chill spreads as shadows coil around you. (Self: RES +1 / Other: tempDebuff ATK-1 for 3 turns)

name: Deathless Onslaught
description: The relentless dead surge forward without fear. (Self: battle / Other: battle)

name: Harvest of Souls
description: Each foe's fall feeds the eternal void. (Self: loot / Other: RES -1)

name: Funeral March
description: A dirge that saps the will to fight. (Self: HP +1 / Other: tempDebuff DEF-1 for 3 turns)

name: Wail of the Damned
description: The scream chills the living marrow. (Self: PSY +1 / Other: ATK -1)

name: Boneshard Volley
description: Splinters of the grave pierce mortal flesh. (Self: battle / Other: battle)

name: Ghoul's Feast
description: The fallen fuel the unholy host. (Self: HP +1 / Other: loot)

name: Tombguard's Grip
description: Cold hands drag the foe toward darkness. (Self: tempBuff DEF+1 for 3 turns / Other: tempDebuff ATK-1 for 3 turns)

name: Eternal Rest
description: Granting peace through endless night. (Self: RES +1 / Other: RES -1)

name: Plaguewind
description: A fetid gust wilts all in its path. (Self: battle / Other: tempDebuff DEF-2 for 2 turns)

name: Crypt's Secret
description: A hidden cache among the dead. (Self: loot / Other: DEF -1)

name: Specter's Veil
description: The living blade passes through shade, to no avail. (Self: tempBuff RES+2 for 3 turns / Other: loot)

name: Nocturne of Silence
description: Music that stills both heart and hope. (Self: HP +1 / Other: RES -1)

name: Revenant's Charge
description: Even the grave cannot slow their march. (Self: battle / Other: battle)

name: Soul Shackle
description: Binding the essence itself. (Self: PSY +1 / Other: tempDebuff ATK-1 for 3 turns)

name: Carrion's Claim
description: Nothing is wasted under the Pact. (Self: loot / Other: loot)

name: Lich's Insight
description: A mind sharpened by centuries of death. (Self: PSY +1 / Other: DEF -1)

name: Morbid Fortitude
description: Pain is but a fading memory. (Self: HP +1 / Other: battle)

name: Necrotic Armor
description: Bone and rot guard the wearer. (Self: tempBuff DEF+1 for 3 turns / Other: DEF -1)

name: The Final Candle
description: Its guttering light heralds the endless night. (Self: RES +1 / Other: battle)
